name: OUT OF CONTROL (v0.2)
description:
· Your plane has suffered a malfunction, only navigation tools are operating.

· You must get to the landing areas as best as you can.

· Use the passengers to distribute weight, changing the flight direction.

· Stuff inside can catch fire, draining your oxygen supply quicky. Any passenger can manually extinguish it.

For better quality, download the .zip file, unzip it, then play from OUT OF CONTROL.exe
